description: Constructed from lightweight fleece, these shorts feature reflective signature graphics and concealed zippers for a sleek, modern appearance.
fitting_details: All sizes have an 8" inseam. Size medium has a 33" waist that expands to 39" and an 11.75" rise.
Front left zip pocket. Front right angled pocket. Back right zip pocket.
Reflective "RLX Ralph Lauren" print at the left thigh. Reflective "02 Unit RLX/Technical Knitwear" print at the back of the left leg. Reflective "RLX 067" print at the back of the right leg.
This product is made with recycled polyester. By turning industrial and post-consumer polyester waste into new product, we are reducing our dependence on virgin petroleum-based material.
Shell: 60% cotton, 40% recycled polyester. Ribbed trim: 58% cotton, 48% recycled polyester, 2% elastane. Machine washable. Imported.
Visit corporate.RalphLauren.com/citizenship-create-timeless-style for more information on Ralph Lauren's sustainability initiatives.
Model is 6'1"/185 cm and wears a size medium.
